{{ item.name }}

{{ item.memory[0].price | currency }}
import { DataService } from '../../service/data.service' import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.scss'] }) export class ProductsComponent { listProducts:any[] =[] searchField:string = ''; config: any; constructor(private DataService:DataService) { this.config = { itemsPerPage: 6, currentPage: 1 }; } ngOnInit() { this.loadproducts(); } loadproducts() { this.DataService.get("/products").then((res:any)=>{ this.listProducts = res.data; }) } }
